source: 211 Montana, VA Montana Health Care, Veteran Support Network, Montana Department of Labor & Industry

resources.name: 211 Montana
resources.description: Free 24/7 resource line connecting individuals to local services including veteran support, housing, food, employment, and mental health services

resources.name: VA Montana Health Care System
resources.description: Comprehensive VA medical facility providing healthcare, mental health services, and homeless veteran support

resources.name: Western Montana Mental Health Center (WMMHC) - Veterans Services
resources.description: Provides community-based mental health, addiction recovery, and housing options for veterans in collaboration with VA

resources.name: Veteran Support Network (VSN) - Missoula
resources.description: Veteran-led organization providing housing, employment, legal assistance, and financial support to veterans

resources.name: NW Montana Veterans Stand Down & Food Pantry
resources.phone: Contact via website or local chamber
resources.description: Provides wraparound veteran services including food boxes, housing referrals, job assistance, and mental health connections

resources.name: Montana Food Bank Network
resources.description: Provides food assistance to eligible individuals including low-income veterans across Montana

resources.name: Montana Legal Services Association (MLSA)
resources.description: Provides free civil legal help to eligible veterans including benefits appeals, housing, and family law services

resources.name: Montana Department of Labor & Industry - Veterans Employment
resources.description: Provides veteran employment services, job placement, and housing assistance support

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line
resources.description: 24/7 confidential support for veterans, service members, and their loved ones

resources.name: HUD-VASH Program (Montana Housing)
resources.description: Provides rental assistance combined with VA case management for homeless veterans
